citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15 on
10-AUG-18.
Attempts to contact included at the door of the house and a voicemail left on the listed phone. No answer was
received after 30 minutes from initial contact.
